analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sat paccaya duka ādi sa ni dassana ttika

original: Naappaccayaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na appaccayam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sappaccayaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naappaccayaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na appaccayam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa paccayaḥ anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: (Naappaccayanaanidassanaappaṭighamūlepi ekameva.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ekam eva hetuyā adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
na saṅkhatam na sap paccaya sadisa
